name: Bar Italia
text:
Pizza Options and Prices
Naz's Pizza (Bar Italia)

Ingredients: Pepperoni, mushrooms, green olives, green peppers, and mozzarella cheese

Prices:

13 inch: $18.00

15 inch: $21.00

18 inch: $26.00

Ingredients: Hot salami, prosciutto, arugula, kalamata olives, and mozzarella cheese

Prices:

18 inch: $28.00

Make Your Own Pizza
Base Price:

13 inch: $13.00

15 inch: $14.00

18 inch: $16.00

Extra Toppings:

13 inch: $1.50 each

15 inch: $2.00 each

18 inch: $2.50 each

Available Extra Toppings:

Pepperoni, bacon, meatballs, mushrooms, jalapeños, green peppers, red peppers, tomato, onions, black olives, green olives, artichokes, pineapple, and garlic

Premium Toppings:

$4.00 for all sizes

Available Premium Toppings:

Sausage, prosciutto, salami, provolone, arugula, rapini, double cheese, and pickled eggplant

Panini (Sandwiches)
Hot Sausage on a Bun with Cheese: $10

Veal on a Bun: $9

Chicken Sandwich: $9

Meatball Sub with Cheese: $9

Panzarotti
Classic: $17

Pepperoni, mushrooms, onions, and mozzarella cheese

Vegetarian: $17

Mushrooms, onions, green peppers, and mozzarella cheese

Make Your Own Panzarotti

With 3 toppings

Extra Toppings: $1 each

Pasta
Pasta with Meatballs: $16

Linguini Alfredo: $16

Garlic butter, cream, parsley, and Romano cheese

Linguini Carbonara: $18

Bacon, onions, garlic, parsley, and eggs

Penne al Diavolo: $18

Bacon, onions, garlic, parsley, and tomato sauce

Green peppers, onions, mushrooms, Italian sausage, garlic, parsley, and tomato sauce
